sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl6_f1, ss_tbl6_f2, ss_tbl6_f3, ss_tbl6_f4, ss_tbl6_f5, ss_tbl6_f6, ss_tbl6_f7, ss_tbl6_f8, ss_tbl6_f9, ss_tbl6_f10, ss_tbl6_f11, ss_tbl6_f12, ss_tbl6_f13, ss_tbl6_f14, ss_tbl6_f15, ss_tbl6_f16, ss_tbl6_f17, ss_tbl6_f18, ss_tbl6_f19, ss_tbl6_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl6 WHERE ss_tbl6_id = @ss_tbl6_id;
